entries.title: What’s holding back the self-driving car revolution?
entries.text: According to promises made a few years ago by automakers and the tech industry, we should all be sharing the road with millions of driverless cars by now.

entries.title: Apple Car could be WINDOWLESS.
entries.text: Apple's long-awaited Apple Car could have virtual displays on the inside instead of clear windows, according to a new patent.

entries.title: Tesla releases new Full Self-Driving Beta update, and it’s a big one.
entries.text: Tesla has started to push a new Full Self-Driving (FSD) Beta software update with improvements based on over 250,000 training video clips from its fleet.
